mapper.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY
B.BOARD_HIT B.BOARD_NO
DESC ASC
) RN , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_HIT , B.CREATE_DT FROM BOARD_T B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.BOARD_CT_NO = 1 AND B.BOARD_STAT = 0
AND B.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{boardTitleSearch} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_FILE_T ( BOARD_FILE_NO, BOARD_PATH, BOARD_RENAME, BOARD_ORIGIN, BOARD_NO ) VALUES ( BOARD_FILE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{boardPath}, #{boardRename}, #{boardOrigin}, #{boardNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_T B WHERE B.BOARD_CT_NO = 1

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_CT_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.EMP_NO, B.CREATOR, B.BOARD_HIT, B.CREATE_DT, B.MODIFY_DT, B.BOARD_LIKE_COUNT, E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, F.BOARD_ORIGIN FROM BOARD_T B INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE_T E ON E.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN BOARD_FILE_T F ON B.BOARD_NO = F.BOARD_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD_LIKE_T WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}
